verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Bwana kama wewe
ungehesabu maovu yetu
Nani angesimama. x3
mbele yako.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lakini kwako kuna
msamaha,
Ili wewe uogopwe,
nimemungoja Bwana
Roho yangu,
na neno lake nimelitumaini.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nafsi yangu
inamngoja Bwana
kuliko walinzi walinzi
waingojavyo asubuhi
naam walinzi
wangojavyo asubuhi.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ee Bwana toka
vilindini nimekulilia,
Bwana sauti yangu usikie,
Masikio yako yasikie
dua zangu.
